Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Revamped by TakeoHonorable
--They'll never know when it's coming
local Properties = { Range = 800, Reload = 20 }
local Self = script
local Tool = Self.Parent Tool.Enabled = true
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local instance,Type,Pcall,Vec3,Rays,world,FindPartOnRay,cframe,fromRGB,Angles = Instance.new,type,pcall,Vector3.new,Ray.new,workspace,workspace.FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList,CFrame.new,Color3.fromRGB,CFrame.Angles
local rad,Material,PartType = math.rad,Enum.Material,Enum.PartType
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
local Components = { Tip = Handle:WaitForChild("Tip"), Smoke = Handle:WaitForChild("Tip"):WaitForChild("Smoke") }
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = instance(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local function VisualizeRay(ray,RayLength,Color,DisplayTime) local RayCast = Create("Part"){ Material = Material.Neon, Color = Color or Color3.new(0,1,0), Size = Vec3((RayLength or 5),1,1), Shape = PartType.Cylinder, CFrame = cframe(ray.Origin, ray.Origin+ray.Direction) * cframe(0, 0, -(RayLength or 5) / 2) * Angles(0,rad(90),0), Anchored = true, CanCollide = false, Parent = world } Services.Debris:AddItem(RayCast,DisplayTime or 1) end
local MouseLoc = (Tool:FindFirstChildOfClass("RemoteFunction") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "MouseLoc", Parent = Tool })
local Sounds = { Fire = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire") }
local Animations = {}
local Player,Character,Humanoid local Events = {} local Debounce = true function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or Humanoid.Health == math.huge or Humanoid.MaxHealth == math.huge then return end
Animations = { Shoot = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool:WaitForChild("Animations"):WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("Shoot")) }
Events[#Events+1] = Tool.Activated:Connect(function() if not Debounce or not Tool.Enabled or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or Humanoid.Health == math.huge or Humanoid.MaxHealth == math.huge then return end
Debounce = false
local Sucess,Pos = Pcall(function() return MouseLoc:InvokeClient(Player)end) Pos = (Sucess and Pos) or Vec3(0,0,0)
local ray = Rays(Components.Tip.WorldPosition , (Pos - Components.Tip.WorldPosition).Unit * Properties.Range)
local hit,pos,nor = FindPartOnRay(world,ray,{Character})
if hit and hit.CanCollide then Tool.Enabled = false
Animations.Shoot:Play()
delay(Properties.Reload,function() Tool.Enabled = true end)
local SharkScript = Self:WaitForChild("SharkScript"):Clone()
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Player, Parent = SharkScript }
Create("CFrameValue"){ Name = "Location", Value = cframe(pos , pos+nor), Parent = SharkScript }
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "PartRef", Value = hit, Parent = SharkScript }
SharkScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService
SharkScript.Disabled = false
Components.Smoke:Emit(Components.Smoke.Rate) VisualizeRay(ray,(pos-Handle.Position).Magnitude,fromRGB(159, 173, 192),.1)
Sounds.Fire:Play() end
Debounce = true end) end
function Unequipped()
for i=1,#Events,1 do if Events[i] then Events[i]:Disconnect() end end Events = {}
end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) --Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)

--Plants the land shark into a surface and creates an illusion of ripples on the surface --[[Land Shark mesh = 118270425 Land Shark Texture = 118270477 --]] --print("Planted Land shark!")
local Properties = { DetectionRange = 45, Lifetime = 60*1, --How long will the landshark stay in place before despawning Sink_Time = .5, --How much time is taken for the shark to go under Detection_Rate = .5, --How often should the shark be checking Shark_Speed = 80, }
local Self = script
local world = workspace
local Deletables = {}
local PartRef,Creator,Loc = Self:FindFirstChild("PartRef"),Self:FindFirstChild("Creator"),Self:FindFirstChild("Location")
if not PartRef or not Creator or not Loc then return end
local instance,Vec3,cframe,Angles,Region = Instance.new,Vector3.new,CFrame.new,CFrame.Angles,Region3.new
local Type,rad,Seed,Wait,inf = type,math.rad,Random.new(),wait,math.huge
local FindPartsInRegion = world.FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList
local NextNumber = Seed.NextNumber
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), }
local Sounds = { SharkSound = Self:WaitForChild("SharkSound") }
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = instance(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
PartRef = PartRef.Value Loc = Loc.Value Creator = Creator.Value
local SharkPart = Create("Part"){ Locked = true, Size = Vec3(6,5,6), Anchored = true, Name = "Land Shark", CanCollide = false, CFrame = Loc * Angles(rad(-90),NextNumber(Seed,0,360),0) }
Sounds.SharkSound.Parent = SharkPart
local SharkMesh = Create("SpecialMesh"){ MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh, MeshId = "rbxassetid://118270425", TextureId = "rbxassetid://118270477", Scale = Vec3(1,1,1) * 3.5, Parent = SharkPart } Deletables[#Deletables+1] = SharkPart Deletables[#Deletables+1] = SharkMesh
SharkPart.Parent = world
local DistanceVector = Vec3(1,1,1)*Properties.DetectionRange*.5 local Reg = Region(Loc.Position - DistanceVector , Loc.Position + DistanceVector) local Caught = false
local CastEffect = Self:WaitForChild("RippleEffect")
if Creator:IsA("Player") then local Clone = CastEffect:Clone()
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "PartRef", Value = PartRef, Parent = Clone }
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "SharkRef", Value = SharkPart, Parent = Clone }
Create("CFrameValue"){ Name = "Loc", Value = Loc, Parent = Clone }
Clone.Parent = Creator:WaitForChild("PlayerGui") Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Clone Clone.Disabled = false -- Activate the ripple effect end
function FindFirstHumInRange() local Cast = FindPartsInRegion(world,Reg,{((Creator and Creator.Character) or nil)},inf)
for i=1,#Cast,1 do
if Cast[i] and Cast[i].Parent then
local Hum,FF = Cast[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),Cast[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField")
if not FF and Hum and (Hum.Health > 0 or Hum.Health == inf)and not IsTeamMate(Creator,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then
return Hum
end
end
end
end
SharkPart.Parent = world
local OrigCFrame = SharkPart.CFrame local Length = Properties.Sink_Time --You only got this amount of time to move out of the area before you are completely done for! Length = 60*Length local Destination = OrigCFrame*cframe(0,-SharkPart.Size.Y*.75,0) for i=1,Length,1 do
if SharkPart and SharkPart.Parent and SharkPart.Anchored then
SharkPart.CFrame = OrigCFrame:Lerp(Destination,i/Length)--Sink the shark in the depths of the land..
end Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() end
local FoundHum local Duration = 0 repeat FoundHum = FindFirstHumInRange() --print(Duration) if FoundHum then Caught = true --warn(FoundHum) break end
Duration = Duration + Wait(Properties.Detection_Rate) until not PartRef or not PartRef.Parent or Caught or not SharkPart or not SharkPart.Parent or Duration >= Properties.Lifetime
if FoundHum and SharkPart and SharkPart.Parent then -- Attempt to attack the character
Sounds.SharkSound:Play()
local Torso = FoundHum.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") or FoundHum.Parent:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
if Torso then
SharkPart.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end
local Hum = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0 or IsTeamMate(Creator,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) or Creator == Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent) then return end
UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Creator) if Hum.Health == inf then Hum.Parent:BreakJoints() else Hum:TakeDamage(100) end
end)
local TorsoLoc = Torso.CFrame
SharkPart.CFrame = cframe(SharkPart.CFrame.p,TorsoLoc.Position)
SharkPart.Anchored = false
if SharkPart:CanSetNetworkOwnership() then SharkPart:SetNetworkOwner(nil) end
SharkPart.Velocity = ((TorsoLoc.Position + Vec3(0,Torso.Size.Y,0)) - Destination.Position) * (TorsoLoc.Position - Destination.Position).Magnitude *.5
if SharkPart and SharkPart.Parent then
local Gyro = Create("BodyGyro"){ MaxTorque = Vec3(1,1,1) * inf, D = 10^3, CFrame = cframe(SharkPart.CFrame.Position,TorsoLoc.Position), Parent = SharkPart }
repeat Gyro.CFrame = cframe(SharkPart.Position,SharkPart.Position + SharkPart.Velocity.Unit) Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until not SharkPart or not SharkPart.Parent
end
end
end
Wait(3.5)
if SharkPart then --print("Destorying Shark") SharkPart:Destroy() end
Wait(1)
for i=1,#Deletables,1 do if Deletables[i] then Deletables[i]:Destroy() end end
Self:Destroy()

--Only those who plant the landsharks will be able to see the ripple effect..
local Self = script
local rService = game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")
local tService = game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")
local Debris = game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")
local Loc,PartRef,SharkRef = Self:FindFirstChild("Loc"), Self:FindFirstChild("PartRef"), Self:FindFirstChild("SharkRef")
if not Loc or not PartRef or not SharkRef then return end
Loc = Loc.Value
PartRef = PartRef.Value
SharkRef = SharkRef.Value
local Base = Instance.new("Part") Base.Shape = Enum.PartType.Cylinder Base.Color = PartRef.Color Base.Material = Enum.Material.Glass Base.Transparency = .6 Base.Size = Vector3.new(.5,0,0) Base.Anchored = true Base.CanCollide = false Base.Locked = true Base.CFrame = Loc * CFrame.Angles(0,math.rad(90),0) Base.Parent = workspace
coroutine.wrap(function() repeat --print(SharkRef.Parent == nil) rService.RenderStepped:Wait() until not SharkRef or not SharkRef.Parent or not PartRef or not PartRef.Parent --print("Despawning the ripple") Debris:AddItem(Base,.5) --[[if Base then Base:Destroy() end]] end)()
local Tween = tService:Create(Base,TweenInfo.new(1.5,Enum.EasingStyle.Sine,Enum.EasingDirection.Out,math.huge,false,0),{Transparency = 1, Size = Vector3.new(1,45,45)})
Tween:Play()

local Tool = script.Parent
local MouseInput = Tool:WaitForChild("MouseLoc",10)
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Input = (game:FindService("ContextActionService") or game:GetService("ContextActionService")) }
local Player,Character,Humanoid
function Equipped() Player = Services.Players.LocalPlayer Character = Player.Character Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end
end
function Unequipped()
end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
function MouseInput.OnClientInvoke() return game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse().Hit.p end

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)
